— Oooh… Lucky yooouu. Where did you get it!
He responds:
— See that tree on the hill? Thick one.
— Yes…
— And I didn't…

Two freedomers are sitting and discussing:
— I think, in order to make a decision, you need to get drunk…
Other says:
— And I think… you don't need to make a decision in order to get drunk.

Two freedomers are chilling together. Smoking weed. Then, first freedomer's dachshund runs in.
Second says:
— Aren't your dog's legs to short…
First looked at his dog closely:
— Naaah. They seem to reach the ground…

Stalker has saved up some money and bought himself a house near the river. Had a drink-two for that. He enters the barn in the morning…
Beats his head against the jamb. Steps on a rake. Jumps back. Slips on cow's shit. Falls into a pig throughs… Then, a shovel falls from the wall and hits him on the head.
Stalker came to his senses in the barn and whispers:
— After what happened, I dare anyone… Anyone, to tell me that anomalies are only present in the Zone.

Two rookies went in the Zone. They didn't even walk far from the border - got attacked by a bloodsucker.
Rookies, of course, got scared and dropped their weapons. They split up and ran in different directions.
Bloodsucker chose one of them and began to chase him.
Rookie clims on the tree. Bloodsucker - after him.
Second rookie returns, grabs his gun and starts shooting at bloodsucker.
BAM! — one of bloodsucker's balls exploded.
 Mutant screams from pain but doesn't stop climbing.
He shoots again: BAM! - mutant loses another ball. Bloodsucker is bleeding hard, but keeps climbing, now even angrier.
BAM! - bloodsucker loses his tool. But he still keeps climbing.
Then, first rookie screams from the top of the tree:
— In the head! Shoot him in the head! He's not going to rape me, you idiot!

Late at night, stalker returns home. Drunk as hell.
His wife speaks to him:
— Again drank with girls in the pub?
Stalker:
— W-wha, w-whaat? W-w-what g-girls? G-got caught by patrol on the border. They were searching me for three hours! Gladly, they let me go.
— And you decided to drink for that, bastard?
— I-I didn't drink. I was getting rid of radiation! Would be bad to bring it home ,right?! — stalker makes excuses
His wife won't calm down:
— Alright… But what about hickeys on your neck?!!
— Thiiiis is blood-sucker! Jumped out on me from the corner, got me good. Luckily, I got away.
Suddenly, his wife smashes his head with a pan.
— Damn you, bastard! Next tiem you see your bloodsucker - tell him, that this lipstick is out of fashion.

Drunk stalker crawls into the Bar. He turns to the wall and starts climbing up.
He climbs on the ceiling, then on the opposite wall and, finally, to the counter.
He orders a bottle of vodka.
Drinks it.
Pulls out artefact from the backpack. Eats it.
After all that, he turns around and crawls out of Bar.
One stalker is stunned by all this. He says to another:
— Did you see that?\He responds:
— He ate it, bastard. What times do we live in. Before, a decent stalker would sniiif it!

Veteran teaches a rookie on how to live in the Zone. What to do to avoid bad situations.
Young asks:
— Imagine this… Together, we're walking throught the Zone. Then suddenly - mutants from every direction. All kinds of them. And we only have one bullet. In your gun. What would you do? Shoot yourself and leave me to die horribly? Or shoot me and try to get out of the situation yourself?
Old stalker immediatly responds:
— Stupid question! Shoot you, of course… For jinxing!

Once, a rich man got bored - he wanted extreme.
He bought the best suit and the coolest gun.
He put a lot of different attachments on it. He even bought bolts from jeweler. Platinum!
To sum up, bought all the best things.
Well, he headed in the Zone.
Boldly drove past block post, throwing money for sentry as he passed by.
He drives through the Zone. Drinks Hennessi from the bottle. Listens to some pop music.
Everything as usual, he feels himself the master of his life.
Then suddenly - o-oh.
He hears husky voice inside his head:
— Hey, dude. Have a smoke?

Through the Zone flies Niva, full of stalkers.
Dodges anomalies on high speed. Rams mutants like a tank.
Flies into block post and drives away, almost hitting BTR.
And speeds out of the Zone…
Passengers are shocked… While driver is very calm - he drives with one hand, and holds bottle of beer in the other, sipping from time to time.
One of the stalkers came to his senses:
— Damn, man! - he says, - Where did you learn to drive like that?
Driver laughs:
— Heh! It's nothing like when I used to work as a minibus driver in Kiev…

Two stalkers make their way through the Pripyat.
One is experienced, other is a rookie.
Well, rookie always checks his map… Experienced only smiles when he sees that.
Then, on the crossroad, veteran slaps his forehead.
He grabs the map from rookie's hands:
— Certainly!.. Come on, newbie. Let's make our way to that house.
As they approached the house, veteran says:
— Now, this front door.
They entered the house, went upstairs. Veteran says:
— Stop! Break this door.
Rookie breaks the door with a run-up.
Veteran:
— Into the kitchen! Break the range hood.
Rookie tries to tear off the grid from the wall.
He puffs and asks with respect:
— Hey, what artefact is it, that you couldn't carry it yourself?
Veteran responds:
— What fucking artefacts have to do with this?!.. I lived here before the accident… Hid vodka from my wife in the vent! Break it faster!

Drunk as fuck stalker comes home in the middle of the night.
His wife is waiting him with a pan.
Stalker crawls into the appartment. He pulls out bolt and throws it towards the toilet.
He thinks for a moment and crawls towards it.
His wife is just watching him do this shit.
Stalker pukes and crawls out of toilet. He pulls out another bolt and throws it towards the bedroom.
Thinks for the moment and crawls towards it.
Then his wife smashes him on the head - BAM!
Stalker passed out.
Later, he regaines consciousness… Pulls out a map - marks new anomaly - and mutters:
— Wheew, I am one lucky bastard…

Dutyers arrive at the Bar after another "holy crusade". Everyone is tired, covered in blood.
They order drinks, obviously…
Commander tells everyone how they were fighting a controller. How they were fighting zombies, choking mutants.
Suddenly, mosquito flies into the room.
Dutyers all like one jump up… and start to shoot him with everything they have.
Barmen screams under the counter:
— Heeey, heeey! Are you nuts?
Commander answers:
— You should kill these little bastards… Before they grow up into a bloodsucker.

Freedomers have repaired a tank and decided to use it in battle. They found a guy who was a tankman before… He starts reading a lecture:
— Well, - he says, people! Tell me: what is the most important in a tank?
— Guuun!
— Wrong answer.
— Armoor!
— Nu-uh! Wrong answer… Hm, you're so green. The most important is… not to shit yourself!

Once, zombies decided to play football. They've split up on teams, found a ball and started playing. After they finished, they smoked some weed. Got high.
Time to go home. "Well, - they think, - we should also take our ball with us - it'll be useful later".
One of them walks up to the ball, bends to take it, when suddenly ball says:
— Heeeey, bro, what are you doing? Don't, I can go home by myself. I'll just wait for my body to stop wandering around, and then go…

Once, two addicted zombies met. One says:
— Yo, man. You have something on ya?
— Yo, dude! I just got a very nice thing from a stalker I know. It rocks!
— It gets you high?
— Just five seconds - and you're flying!
— Wow! How strong is it?
— Stalker said that it'll blow your head off!
— Oooh.. Nice.. How's it called?
— It's called… grenade.

Two stalkers have met, and one of them asks the other:
— Hey, where's Vasya? Didn't see him today.
Second stalker responds:
— He went to gather some mushrooms in the forest.
— And how far did he get?
— Like I fucking know! It depends on how far… the mushrooms will get him.

A thug talks to a stalker he knows:
— Hey, hear me… get me a golden fish, eh. I'll pay ya - name the price… Every dude owns this shit, and I don't, like a loser.
Stalker got puzzled:
— But, it is, like… an artefact, radioactive one.
Thug says:
— Yo, I don't care about this shit. Radioactive, radiopassive - I'm not going to put it in my pants. I'll use it like a real man. Put it on chain and carry it on my neck, like everyone does.

Two controllers sit on the edge of Sarcophagus.
First says, mournfully:
— Damn! My pants fell off.
— Well, - says second controller with no interest whatsoever, — fuck it!
First says with a sigh:
— Eeeh… I can't anymore…

Well. One man approaches a stalker and says:
— Hey, friend! Can you get me a… pseudodog's puppy.
Stalker says:
— Are you nuts? Wanna die? It will tear you apart instantly!
— Nah, you don't understand, — man says, — it's not for me. A present for my mother-in-law.

Happy dutyer walks, swinging his bloody shovel.
Another dutyer walks towards him.
— Where are you going from, bro?
— From the fuuuneral!
— Why are you so happy then?!
— Was burying freeeedomers!
— And why is your shovel bloody?
— Well, that's because these bastards dug out three times at least.!

One day, we were sitting in ambush. Wind got stronger in the evening… whistles, howls. Cold… Everyone is trembling… My stomach starts complaining, like a mother-in-law…
And then, someone grabs me by the shoulder. Veeeery carefuly.
I turn around… And it's a bloodsucker.
I wasn't taken aback. I screamed… and jumped at him. Started… smearing his eyes.
You ask me, what can you use to smear bloodsucker's eyes? Hhheh. When you'll see a bloodsucker two feet away from you… you'll know. It'll appear by itself!»

Stalker goes to hell.
An imp immediatly starts to tell him, how much he will suffer.
— Firstly, — he says, — we'll cover you in shit. Then we'll put you in a boiling tar. Then we will pour liquid iron into your throat. Then, - stalker suddenly interrupts him.
— Okay, old man, I got it. Standard program - theraupetic mud. Bath. Then, I'll be able to visit Bar… You better tell me… Where can I shoot here? I don't wanna lose my skills

Stalker got on an excursion to hell.
Imp shows to him all the sufferings that sinners endure: Boiling tar! Whips! Red-hot coals! Fire everywhere… Screams. Smells of sulfur…
Stalker looks at all of this and says:
— Well, guys. Warm place you got here. Dry. Hm… You also got more entertainments here, than we in the Swamps. So… I'll better stay here.
Once, an old man planted a turnip. In the Zone… Turnip has grown very-very big.\nIn fact, so big… that if old man didn't have a gun - he would not be able to fight back!

Once, a stalker planted a pseudotunip. Pseudotunip has grown big… Very-very big.\nStalker grabbed his grenade launcher - and went to harvest it.\nAnd he would be successful. If… pseudodogs and pseudomouses wouldn't appear!

Bloodsucker enters the Bar:
— Bloody Mary for me!
Well, Barmen does as always. He pours tomato juice. Vodka on top.
Bloodsucker drinks it all in one shot. Pukes. All of this flies into Barmen's face, on the counter and bottles.
— Barmen! What the fuck is that?
Barmen cleares his face, pulls out a sawed-off:
— You, bloodsuckers, are so weird recently! Instead of blood you're asking for fucking tomato juice!.. But you'll have to answer… for the mess.

Stalker enters the Bar:
— Barmen! Give me somethign to eat.
Barmen starts reading the menu:
— Well, today we have a flesh's eye. With tomato sauce. Fried snork legs. With tomato sauce. If you want something fishy, we have bloodsucker's tentacles. With tomato sauce.
Stalker grimaced:
— What are you thinking?! Wanna poison some people?
Barmen got offended.
— Who!? Me?
Stalker:
— Well not me, right!?.. Give me a mushroom sauce! No fucking tomatoes!

Old stalker has retired. He sits next to a fireplace with his dog and reads a book:
— … In greek mythology, Cerber is a monstrous two-headed dog with snake's tail… He guards entrance to the undeground kingdom.
Suddenly, dog barks:
— Woof!
Stalker got alarmed, grabbed his gun. It was quiet.
He says to the dog:
— Hey, buddy, what's gotten into you?
Dog:
— Woof-woof. Wo-ot a bullshit your mythology is.

Rookie walks through the Zone. He's daydreaming, when falls in a ravine and starts rolling down fast.
Below him - a whirligig. Stalker thinks:
— That's it… Goodbye, mommy!.
Suddenly someone grabs him. Stalker looks at his saviour… and it's a zombie who got him. Zombie pulls him our of ravine and drags him somewhere.
Stalker says:
— Z-zombie, ahem, t-thank you for saving me from the anomaly… But w-where are you dragging me?
Zombie responds:
— Controller only eats fresh meat, he doesn't eats mince. And food is not allowed to talk.

Once, a bloodsucker and a contoller bumped into eachother inside the Agroprom Underground.
Bloodsucker:
— Fuck, you scared me, freak!
Controller:
— You better take a look on yourself.
Bloodsucker:
— Fuck you!
Controller takes over the bloodsucker and bends him to the puddle:
— I said - look.

Once, a controller and a bloodsucker bumped into eachother.
Bloodsucker:
— Damn, you scared me, monster!
Êîíòðîë¸ð:
— Look at yourself! Wouldn't call you a beautiful prince either.

Three stalkers meet at the Garbage. One of them has only one knocked out… Other has all his face in scars, third has his toes… completely missing!
Well, they started asking eachother what happened.
First stalker points at his eye and says:
— I stole loot from the guys - had to shoot my way out.
Everyone respectully nod.
Second stalker points at his face:
— I walked into… a pack of pseudodogs.
Everyone says:
— Respect, yeah, totally!
Everyone look at third stalker. He's confused and stays silent.
— Hey bro, what happened to your leg?
— Eeeh, was working for guys in the camp, so I put on my lead underpants to protect my pride from the radiation.
— Well. You put it on… then what?
— Eeeeh… The elastic band burst.

A group of real men drive through the Zone. Well, they stopped to take a leak.
They just unzipped their pants - when BAM - bloodsucker jumps out of the bushes and screams:
— I WILL SUCK YOU DRYYYYY!!!!
Guys look at eachother and calmly say:
— Well, thanks for offer, bro, but we're just from the District…

Two guys meet in the Zone.
One tells the other:
— Yo, cool hat. Rat?
Other punches him in the face.
— You fucking bastard! You'll answer for «rat»!

Three stalkers are walking together and talking, who's cooler.
First stalker says:
— I'm very cool, I killed three bandits all by myself.
Second says:
— Naah, bro. I'm more cool for sure. I killed ten of them!
Third:
— Naaaah, you guys are losers! I killed hundred of them!
Suddenly, they see a thug walking. He looks tired and he wears shabby leather jacket. They also hear him whistling something like „Vladimir central“.
Stalkers:
— Fuck! — they jumped to the sides and hid in the bushes.
Well, that thug didn't notice anything and passed by them. One of the stalkers says:
— Yo, guys, who is this stinker?
Second says:
— Ye, stinker indeed! What the fuck?
Third says:
— Why are you looking at me??? I did it out of hate…

When Badyan was a kid, he met something like a «fairy». And it says:
— ß ëèáà ìîçãè òå äàì ïî æèçíè àùùå ÷óìîâûå, è ïàìÿòü òàêóþ, êàê ó áàòàíàâ âíàòóðå, ëèáà… òû áóäåø ïðàâèëüíûì ïàöàíîì „ïðè äåëàõ“.
Íó ÿ åãî, òèïà, ñïðàøèâàþ:
— Íó è ÷î?
— Íó ÷î ÷î… ß íå ïîìíþ ÷î.

A guy approaches the trader. Like:
— Yo, wanna buy a grenade for fifty rubles?
— Wha? Are you kidding me. Sure!
— Here, hehe, take it… And the pin will cost you two hundred more. Heeeeh.

A brick has fell from the roof and killed a man at abandoned factory. People gathered around:
— Fuuuck, like we don't have enough monsters and controllers around… Now we have bricks falling of the roofs — «Fucking hell», «unlucky guy» and stuff liek that.
Then, one experienced stalker looks closely and says:
— Chill, guys. Good riddance — it's a zombie.
But people only became sadder:
— Maaan, what the fuck - so many zombies around, a brick can't fall without hitting one.

Once, a piece of slate fell down from the roof at Freedom's base. Somebody got hit by it. As always, people gathered around, everyone starts worrying about the guy - this is much easier to fix the damn roof:«Damn, guy got unlucky». Then they took a closer look - it wasn't a man, but a zombie. He was right in their base! And what do you think, did they panic and increase guard at their posts? Fuck no. They only started to worry more:\n— What the fuck, so terrible, so much mutants around! There's nowhere to even spit anymore, - and even now… they're worrying.

Once, group of dutyers have caught a hippy freedomer. They decided to interrogate him - what does Freedom have and where it is… But he won't tell them a single thing, until he wanted to smoke.
— Give me a smoke, yo. I'll tell you eeeeverything!
Well, dutyers gave him back his stuff… He made a joint, smoked it, got high and chill.
— Well, - they ask - where?
He looks confused:
— Eeehm, guys. Are you joking?? Can't you see - you have artefacts right un-der your feet! Oooh, man! Now the sky is all di-amond! Woooow...

Once, a dutyer got lost. He walks around and screams:
— Peeeople, is there anyone, aaay.
Suddenly, someone catches up to him and… touches his backpack. Dutyer turns around and sees a sad-looking bloodsucker. It says:
— What are you screaming for, hm?
Dutyer already has his pants full of brown… but he still responds:
— I mean, I'm lost here. So I thought if I scream, someone would hear me.
Bloodsucker stood silent for a moment, then says:
— Well, I heard you... what are we going to do now?

Controller teaches his dog different tricks. Like, to walk on his hind legs, play dead, stuff like that. The whole thing goes very slow, dog isn't fast learner. Zombie stands nearby and laughs:
— Naah, it won't work, you're just wasting your time…
Controller shakes his finger at him and says:
— Listen, stal-ker! Shut up, eh. You didn't learn how to bring me slip-pers right away either!

Two stalkers arrive at the Bar. One of them has very cool Toyota, other - an old Niva. Cool guy leaves his car and sees that the guy who owns Niva can't close his door. He comes closer to him and says:
— Maan, why are you sweating on this so much? Who are you afraid of? It's peaceful place - I don't even lock my car!
Niva owner responds:
— Well, I used to leave it unlocked too. And then yesterday burers got inside it. And puked on my seats.

Two stalker park their cats near Bar. First stalker is showing off, acts like he's cool… on his Land Rover or something like that. Second stalker - dirty, on his old Niva. Cool guy starts laughing, looking how other stalker can't close his dented door. Cool guy yells:
— Maan, what are you doing? Who needs your fucking garbage? Comedian!.. Even I don't lock my car. Who are you afraid of?
Second stalker stays silent and finally closes his door. After some time, he returns from the Bar and sees the cool guy standing near his car, freezed… he just looks in the salon. Stalker comes closer and takes a look… then he tells the cool guy:
— Yeeeeah, man… Unlucky. It happened to me once, too… didn't lock my door - burers got inside and shitted on everything.

Two cars have "kissed each other" on the road in the Zone. A group of stalkers emerged from each car. They started arguing, which quickly escalated into a fight.\nController sits in the bushes and smiles:\n— Ooooh, niice. A few minutes, and food will be ready - might even call my friends for a dinner.

Well, two Nivas have bumped hard into each other somewhere in the Zone. Four stalkers got out of first car. From second car - same amount. Word after word, a fight started. Then - shooting. Controller sits in the bushes near the road and giggles.\n— Damn, I chose really cool place! Very comfortable to eat here with friends… I just need to wait for shashlik to get ready - then we'll start.

Mercs and bandits couldn't share the road somewhere in the Zone. Both sides got out of their cars and pulled out their guns. Shooting commenced… Controller sits near crossroad - he's happy:\n— Yeah, I chose a really nice place… For looong I wanted to see a real shootout!

One day, a dutyer that should've returned to base in the morning dissappeared. His comrades are waiting for him, nervous. After some time, he finally appears. Everyone asks him:
— What happened? Where were you been?
He responds:
— Ah, it's just… I decided to hunt mutants around here… As al-ways, kil-led twenty blood-suc-kers, fi-ve burers, eradicated three packs of blind dogs. Killed so much zombies that I didn't even bother to count!
— Well, that's obvious… Tell us what happened?
— Well, I arrived at my tent. And see - something so big and scary, that even I won't be able to beat it. Forgot that there was a mir-rror at the entrance. Well… I got so scared, I've shit myself.

Stalker stands at the crossroads and reads the pointers:
«Right - anomalies and a little bit of loot. Forward - hoards of mutants and enough of loot. Left - pubs, girls and tons of loot».
Stalker thinks for a moment and advances forward. He thinks:
— I thikn I heard something about it… Fuck, forgot it. I'll ask my friends in the Bar - what the fuck is this?! "Pubs and girls".

Old and young dutyers are walking together. Suddenly old dutyer stops and whispers to young one:
— Slowly. Go to that tree.
Rookie walks on his toes, crawls, sweats. He reaches the tree and waves his hand: like, what's next?.. Old dutyer yells with happiness:
— Yoooo!! I knew it - they fucking lie! There's no anomaly!

Experienced stalker returns to his jeep. Suddenly, he sees a controller walking around it. Stalker says:
— Get the fuck out of here, while you're still in one piece!
Controller got offended:
— Man… Are you stupid? Why would I need your garbage…
Stalker doesn't stop:
— Told you - fucking go! Maybe you won't… steal it. But you're very likely to… scribble a bad word on it…

Once, a mercs have caught a stalker. They approached the well and dipped him upside down to the waist.
After a minute, they pull him out and ask:
— Any artefacts, money?!
He responds:
— Nope…
They dip him again. Then they pull him out and ask again:
— Any artefacts, money?!
— I said, no!
They dip him again, pull out, ask:
— Any artefacts, money?!
Stalker couldn't stand it:
— Fuuuck. You either dip me deeper, or hold longer. The bottom is muddy - can't see shit!

A Black Stalker appeared in the Zone. He approaches camps during night, sticks his hand in the tent and says:
— Giiiiiivee me waaateer, - and if you try to go outside or don't give him water - he'll kill ya!
And once, a man decided to prank his friends: he got out of his tent quietly, put on a black glove and crawled to his friend's tent. He crawled and starts asking:
— Waaateeer, give me waaaater…
Suddenly, a hand sticks out of tent and grabs him by the neck! And a husky voice says quietly:
— And why would you need my water?!

A young stalker walks through the Zone. Then BAM! He sees a big grove that's not marked on the map. Rookie doesn't know what to do: it's scary to go in, but it's unknown how to go around it…
Suddenly - a man appears nearby. And he doesn't look like dutyer or merc.
Young stalker rejoiced and approached the other:
— Can you please give me a hint on how to go around this grove?
He responds:
— Sure, I'm walking that way too, let's go together.
They're making they way around. It's very calm and nice. Young stalker got bored and started asking questions:
— It must be cool to be a veteran stalker, you don't have to be afraid of each noise anymore, don't even need to carry many weapons on you - there was, indeed, no gun on the man.
The other stalkers bursts laughing:
— Ha! And who are you afraid of?
— What do you mean, - young stalker got surprised, - I mean, the monsters. Controllers, for example!
The man got silent and responds with resentment in his voice:
— Fool… If you'd say a zombie or bloodsucker… But us - controllers! Why call us «monsters»?!

Two stalkers meet:
— Hey, do you know about Vasya, the one who dreamed of becoming a pilot when he was little?
— What happened to him?
— He got into a springboard yesterday!
— Oh my…
— Yeah… Well, at least his dream came true. He flew!

Once, a Duty made a very secret ambush and caught one stalker… He was drunk and had full backpack of items. Stalker pleads to the dutyers:\n— Commander, let me go… They told me - drinking is bad, but I didn't listen. They were right, eh?.. If I wouldn't be drunk - I would never go here - the whole Zone saw you preparing this ambush yesterday!

Rookie stalker got caught near block post and interrogated:
— Why did you try to infiltrate the Zone's territory with unregistered hunting rifle and ammo?
Stalker is… drunk… His head feels like a barrel. He got tired this interrogation and responds:
— Druuunk, ye. Drunk. If I wasn't drunk… I would keep a 5 kilometer distance from you, freaks.

A border guard interrogates an experienced stalker:
— So, you admit that you, while being drunk, tried to leave the Zone's territory near 12-th block post while carrying items that are forbidden to taken out?
Stalker got tired of sitting for three hours… He responds:
— So… yes! I admit, commander! I admit everything! If I wouldn't be drunk - I would never go near you, freaks, while carrying my stuff.

There are rumors of walking anomaly - a stalker that does not drink or smoke.\n«Lured by the smell of milk or semolina porridge. At the distance of 200 meters around him… geiger counter goes berserk.»

Announcement on Duty's base:\n«We're organizing a trip deep into the Zone in order to hunt mutants and collect artefacts. Everyone who likes this stuff - gather around 9:00. Bring two bottles of this stuff with you.»

Announcement in the Bar:\n— …And now about the celebration of Stalker day, we'll be organizing a raid deep inside the Zone for hunting, - meaning mutants, - collecting - meaning artefacts. Everyone who likes this stuff, gather here at 6:30. Bring two liters of «this stuff» with you.

Alright. Stalker visits the doctor and says:
— Doc, I can't sleep at all… In my dreams, I'm trapped in the sarcophagus… with horde of mutants, and they slowly tear me apart.
— This is a controller alerting you, dear. Here's the recipe: next time you're going deep into the Zone, bring him a bottle. Or else, the dream may come true.
— Well, thank you so much, doctor.
— No problem! - says the controller, - Thank you for calling me "doctor". It's a small thing, but a pleasant one…

Student on exam:
— You see, professor, I can't pass the math… because I haven't slept for a month. When I close my eyes, I see a horrible picture… some mutants pressed me to the wall near the nuclear station and prepare to tear me… apart.
Professor says:
— Ha. Even if you'd finish studying in university, young man, with your knowledge you'd probably become a stalker… which would lead you to your nightmares. Though, I have a medicine for that. You didn't pass the re-examination, which means you will be expelled and taken by the army. And you won't meet any monsters, excluding the "old men".

One stalker tells the other:
— I visisted Duty recently, they had a party…
— And?
— And… I was given a duty!.. Then I visited Freedom.
— So?
— They told me: «Man! Free!»

Two stalkers have met, one of them says:
— Visited Duty yesterday…
— So what?
— What "so what"? Now I have a duty to do. Ha. Then I went to Freedom…
— And what?
— And became f-r-e-e!

Two stalkers sit on the lake shore. One tells the other:\n— I have something to say about the radiation. People are lying about it! I'm living here for 5 years already. And didn't notice a single change! What do you think?\n— Ye, bullshit for sure. But… I noticed that my scales got more itchy recently.

Once, a soldier got lost somewhere in the Zone. He walks around and yells:
— Peeeopleee! Someooone, heeeeelp!
A stalker sits in the bushes and laughs quietly.
— Yeah, yeah… When you were ripping us off at the block post, we were just assholes and bastards… and now when you got into trouble - we're suddenly a people you can rely on…

A bandit got lost somewhere in the Zone… He's hungry, bruised and he doesn't even care where he's headed, he just yells:
— Somebody, help. Really, help me.
Suddenly, pair of stalkers came out from the tree.
— What are you yelling for?
Bandit says:
— Yo, guys, help me please. Guys!
Stalkers point their guns at him. They just stand there and wonder:
— Heh. Look at him, he's going all "Guys… Help me, please". But at the garbage, what did he call us? Bastards and assholes?

Once, a dutyer got lost somewhere in the Zone. He's walking around, barely alive, and yells:\n— Soomebooodyyy! Please, save me!.. I swear, I'll quit drinking and smoking, I won't EVEN say a bad word about freedomers ever again!
Nice! Ahaha-haha!
Eh, not even smiling.
Hey, you know something interesting?
Nah, it's just tales.
Damn, Zone is full of surprises...

Do you know about a place called the Foggy Swamps? People say that it's located to the west of Dead city. Though it's almost impossible to get there now. Doctor lived there before, by the way. Now there's always military choppers patrolling the area - you can't even get close. You may try going through the bushes, but it's full of mutants. From fleshes down to chimeras. You better not go in there, at least for now.

Do you know about the Dark Stalker? Some people say that he is an anomaly somewhere in the Foggy Swamps. He appears from the evaporations and attacks anyone who dares to step on his territory. Though, the military are still sitting in those swamps. How would they be able to be there with something like that right under their nose?

Did you ever hear about the mutant called «phantasm»? They say it looks like a flying brain with one eye and small claws. It could create phantoms to protect itself, just like a controller does. But those phantoms are not easy to kill, in fact, you can't kill them at all - if you shoot at them, they just split into more. The only way to deal with it is to kill the phantasm.

I heard one story, about dutyers hunting a very rare mutant - phantasm. It was like a flying brain that creates illusions. They say it lived in the Foggy Swamps before the military settled there. It made a lot of troubles for the people around, so dutyers sent a group and killed it. And right after it became safe there - military arrived and settled their base.

I heard about a faction, called «The Last Day». People say it consists of crazy stalkers who lived in Foggy Swamps. They believed that all this would come to an end soon. No, not the end of the Zone. The end of everything - our whole world. They were also studying the dead, dunno why though. They didn't have any allies, but had plenty of enemies. It's now wonder that no one heard from them for a long time already. But who knows, maybe they're still sitting in that swamp, hiding.

Do you know Semenov, the ecologist from Yantar? I heard that he got a unique Beretta that can outperform any other pistol. Semenov says that he upgraded it himself, worked on it for a couple of months. But I don't believe that - they're scientists, not mechanics!

I heard that around a year ago a foreigner appeared in the Zone. He came with some crowbar in his hand and asked many questions. He walked around for a couple of days and suddenly disappeared. I think, last time they saw him in Wild Territory. His name feels familiar... tho I can't remember where I heard it before.

Some people say that monolithians have a very cool gun - G36 «Crystall». I heard that they somehow attached the «Gravi» artefact into it's barrel, making bullets fly faster. But it's all bullshit, I mean, even our scientists couldn't come up with something like that. But maybe they did, but kept it secret... Well...

I heard that in the past soldiers here used special AKS-74U with integrated silencers. Maybe for night-time operations, I dunno. Though, I didn't see a single one of those guns around. Traders don't sell them, dead don't have them, couldn't even find one in a stash...

Remember, when a group of mercs attacked the Rookie Village? When the shooting was over, an unique «AH94» was found on the body of their commander. It's weight was increased to boost the accuracy. I wonder, who uses that gun now...

I heard that Seriy found a unique AKS-74U somewhere in the Garbage. It layed in the pile of rusty trash, but looked completely new. And most important thing - you could shoot it as much as you want, it would never break. Even more, the bullets flew out of the barrel twice as fast! Wow...

Around a year ago I heard about a foreigner that came here. I don't remember much about him, but he had a very cool gun. He called it «Big Ben», but it was actually a Desert Eagle, modified to shoot 9x39 ammo. I want something like this for myself too...

I heard that freedomers once tried to modify Bulldog to make it shoot M209 grenades. But they didn't know, that those grenades work differently - VOG-25 fly out with the casing, while M209 leave it in the barrel. Well, they managed to stuff those grenades inside, made a testing shot - and the explosion was so big that they were scattered across five meter radius. The grenade launcher exploded right in their hands. That's why you don't try to modify something unless you know how it works...

I heard that there was a stalker called Huckster. He was just a trader, but he had a very interesting gun - an old family double barrel rifle. Though he made sawed-off out of it and sold it. Well, they didn't call him Huckster for nothing.

Do you know something about Borov? The one who was leader of bandits some time ago. I heard he had a unique gun - a personal Walther P99. The funny thing is, the gun was made for some known politician. How did it get into the Zone - mystery. Even more mystery, how did it end up in bandit's hands. Was Borov a politician before? Ha!

I heard that a unique «Vintorez» was found somewhere around Radar. It was a personal weapon, actually, and had a name on it - "Sergei Quiet". This «Vintorez» was way more powerful than the usual version, it seems that the bullets were flying out at higher speed. Yeah, I wish I had a gun like that. I would even buy it, but where to find the seller?

I heard there once was a mercenary called Ara. He had a very sharp knife - it could have opened the exoskeleton like a tin can. Tho, Ara got killed long time ago while he was buying information from a freedomer. But where did the knife go?
Dutyers had a unique SVD before, they called it «Farshooter», it had a unique scope and reduced recoil. «Duty» wanted to make it into a mass production, but somebody stole the prototype. That's it.

There was a stalker called Kid. He was really small and thin. I have no idea why did he even go into the Zone. But he had a very unusual rifle. He took SVU and modified it as he wanted, making it lighter and adding recoil compensator. I don't know what happened to him, but someone has seen his rifle in freedomer's hands. Maybe he joined them, maybe sold it, maybe... they took it from his body.

Do you remember Max, who was one of the main guys in «Freedom»? I heard that he had a unique rifle - SVU with increased fire rate. I think he sold it to Nimble, but it seems that somebody has already bought it from him.

I heard that Voronin saved some gunsmith, and the gunsmith gave him a unique rifle. He took a «Groza» and increased it's stats, making it into a beautiful peace of art. Not gonna lie, I would very much like a gun like that in my hands...

Do you know about Gauss rifles? I only heard about them, but what's interesting: to create batteries for the gun, the «Flash» artefact is using, and some monolithians are creating new type of batteries, using the «Battery» artefact. These batteries have increased energy capacity. Damn, I want a gun like that.

A friend of mine told me about an anomaly, that doesn't even have a name. He said it looks like a light-distorting hemisphere that flies from one place to another... He told me that you can only find this anomaly somewhere deep inside the Zone. Though how the hell can he know that - he never was there...

I heard there's an anomaly called «Amoeba». You can't see it until you step right on it. When you step on it - a jellyfish-like thing will jump from below the ground and float in the air. If it'll touch you - say goodbye. This «Amoeba» is fully covered in some kind of acid that can dissolve any suits with ease. You can find this anomaly in a forest or a swamp. So if you ever decide to visit a grassy place - remember to throw bolts.

I heard about a rare anomaly called «Witches' jelly». They say that this isn't just an anomaly, but an artificial one, created even before the Second disaster. It looks a lot like "Fruit punch" - a green shining puddle. But it's actually a fungus that spreads across your whole body, disintegrating all tissues on contact. So if you ever touch this anomaly - immediately cut off the limb that made contact. Or else you will become a part of that puddle.

Ecologists have told me about an interesting anomaly - «Mosquito bald». It works like a gravitational field that changes the direction of objects inside it. If you throw a bolt inside - it will fly out from the side. But if a living thing happens to enter the anomaly range - it'll be torn to pieces.

Some guy told me... There's a very rare anomaly - «Dead zone». Nor your eyes, nor detector can see it. Radiation inside that zone is even worse than at the Radar, and all devices stop working near it. If somebody enters it - he'll either die instantly or in 2-3 days. The scariest part is - they'll just drop dead, like from a heart attack. The body organs are fine, no punctures, not even scratches. The living will just become the dead.

Did you know that the «Mama beads» artefact wasn't formed in thermal anomalies before? I heard that there was an anomaly called the «Time machine». The anomaly itself is harmless, but time inside it feels like it goes way slower. If you get inside it - you'll have to spend a lot of time getting out. And right in the centre of it the «Mama beads» were formed. And what's interesting, the moment you grab the artefact - anomaly disappears, like it was never there...

You know, «Electras» are nothing. I heard about more interesting electrical anomaly - «Meat grinder». Sparkles flying in the air, ground discharging. The anomaly builds up a charge of electricity inside itself, doesn't react to any objects, but when a living thing happen to enter it's range - a discharge strikes from the centre of it, twisting and tearing the body apart. And after that, the anomaly becomes harmless for some time, until it'll recharge completely.

You saw the «Burnt fuzz» already, right? Did you know, that there's a similar anomaly? It's called «Rusty hair». It's kind of mutated lichen than hangs down the roofs and ceilings. But, contrary to «Burnt fuzz», this lichen doesn't care if you walk past it at slow or high speed - if you touch it, you'll instantly get strong burn. And that's not the end of it. If something touches the «Rusty hair», it's vines will spread out, trying to catch as much objects as possible. Not bad for a linchen, eh?

Did you know, that «Comets» worked a bit differently before? They were called «Torrids» then. You couldn't see them like you can now. Instead of fireball there was just a steam flying. If you throw something in that steam - it turns into flames. And what's interesting: the temperature of the flames were lower than it is now, which means you could get away with just a burn. And if you get hit by «Comet» now - you become dead. Maybe the radiation changed it somehow, maybe something else...

Recently I heard about a strange anomaly - the «Grabber». It looks like some sort of a plant, laying in bushes, almost invisible. If you step on it - it'll slam shut, catching you inside. And if you get trapped there - say goodbye, you'll get dissolved like a fly. But if you walk through it slowly, like you do with «Burnt fuzz», the anomaly won't react at all. So if you ever go into a grassy place - remember to look where you step.

I heard that there was an anomaly before - «Black thorn». It looked like a lot of black needles in the ground, if you touch them - they'll shoot themselves towards you, piercing even strong vests. And for the scariest part - if it hits an animal or a human, more needles will grow from it's flesh, tearing through the skin. I dunno why is it not present anymore, tho I heard some stalkers found a way to get rid of it completely. Any way, good thing that it's gone.

I heard that the «Black thorn» anomaly was spread everywhere across the Zone. It looked like a bunch of black needles, growing from the ground. I don't know, how stalkers managed to get rid of it, but that's a good thing. If it would still be present, I would stay in Cordon forever.

Do you know about the «Soap bubble» anomaly? Well, imagine a semi-transparent sphere, floating in the air. And if something touches this sphere - it'll burst with a tremendous power. And if a human happens to touch it - well, in the best case, he'll be a cripple for the rest of his life.

I heard about an anomaly called «Howl». This anomaly strikes at your psy health: you'll start hearing a wolves howling around, and the longer you stay in that anomaly, the more wolves start to howl. All of this will cause you to feel very strong panic, it might even make you crazy. So if you ever hear a dog start howling - you better leave the place immediately.

I met a strange thing some time ago - something like orange fog. I was with a companion then, he thought it was just evaporations - the thing took place in the swamps. My companion made a step inside it and suddenly stopped. I pat his shoulder, and he looks at me with such anger. I saw him grabbing his rifle, so I pulled him from the fog - he passed out immediately. When he came to his senses, he told me, that once he stepped inside the fog - everything became orange and hateful. And when he saw me - hatred filled him so much, he wanted to kill me. When we got back to the camp, we asked some veterans about it, and they told us that it was an anomaly - «Crazy gas». Good thing I was able to save my partner, or else one of us would end up dead right there. And even worse - both of us.

An experienced stalker told me about an interesting anomaly - «Masher». It looks like a semi-transparent balls slowly floating in the air. And if something gets underheath them - it gets squished like under a press. I don't want to think what would happen with a person if he would get under this "ball".

Do you know about the stalker named Kid? He was a short and thin guy. I heard that he was a true master, he could modify any rifle to make it better. Well... He died in an anomaly some time ago. In the «Slaughterhouse». Shame, he was such a pro at his job...

There's an anomaly called «Slaughterhouse». It doesn't look special, just a weird shadow on the ground. If you step inside it - it will squeeze your lungs when you'll try to breathe in. It's like the air is way too heavy, or the other way around. Yeah...

I heard about an anomaly called «Goo». It looks like a brown bubbling puddle. Or like a boiling mud. If something falls in it - the puddle will foam up and splash out a five-meter column of brown dirt in the air. This dirt will then fall down on the ground, melting everything, even rocks. After the dirt falls down, it evaporates into toxic gas, so you don't want to get near it without a mask. The best way to deal with this anomaly is to walk around it at safe distance. And don't even think of throwing something into the puddle, unless you want to become a melted corpse.

Once, I went on a raid with my friend. We found a strange field that wasn't even marked on the map. Well, we were very young then, so we decided to try walking through it. The further we went, the more sleepy we became. I realised that something was off, so I shook my friend on the shoulder and ran. He understood and ran after me. I almost fell down from the tiredness, but we were able to get out. When we got out, we felt such a thirst that we almost drank all the water we had. Later, I asked an experienced stalker about that field. He told me that this field - is an anomaly, called «Poppy field». It will make you sleepy, and if you fall asleep - you won't wake up, ever. I think it's obvious that we never went there again.

I heard about a very scary anomaly, called the «Web». It looks like a very thin strings between the trees - you won't notice them unless you use a flashlight to light them up. Detector will only react to it when you get very close to the string, so if you won't be walking slow - you won't be able to react in time. The string itself is very thin and very sharp, even sharper than the knife. It will cut through any vest like through butter, so you can imagine what will happen to the bare flesh. But what's strange: the moment string starts to cut through flesh - it gets torn apart, leaving only big bleeding wounds behind.

I was once exploring the old houses that are scattered around - almost got into a strange anomaly. That house looked just like the rest, but one of the walls was completely ruined. And everything that would get inside the house would fly out that broken wall at huge speed. Good thing I have a habit of throwing bolts in front of me. Or else I would end up flying out. I later asked a friends of mine about that thing. They told me that it was an anomaly called "Vacuum cleaner". They said it can not only push you out, but also suck you in with huge strength, squishing human like a sponge. So remember to throw bolts, mate.

I heard about a place where veterans love to scary rookies. That place has a unique anomaly in it - the «Stomper». This anomaly is completely invisible, but as you enter it you immediately hear some kind of stomping in the distance. The more time you spend inside, the closer the stomping grows. And when it gets very very close - it suddenly disappears, leaving only silence behind. Experienced stalkers love to take rookies to that place - to laugh as newbies are scared to death, trying to find the source of the sound. But recently one of the rookies got so scared, he pulled out his gun and shot in the distance few times, hitting one of the stalkers in the arm. Since then stalkers have stopped toying with rookies at that place.

I heard very creepy story... A stalker called Stagger went on a deep raid with his group. An emission passed, and after a day Stagger returned to camp alone. Though, he didn't talk to anyone and acted weirdly. Some people thought that he got zombified. But he looked completely normal. He just arrived at the camp, walked around a bit and left, not saying a word. One hour later, his group arrived. Stalkers asked them, why did they split up with the Stagger, which got the group very surprised. They said that Stagger died in an emission two days ago, they buried him. Everyone got shocked. Everyone, excluding the one old stalker that was in the Zone since the first days. He said that it's a very rare anomaly - if a stalker happens to die during an emission, his "twin" will appear somewhere in the Zone. This "copy" will then wander across the Zone, and usually it dies in a short time due to some anomaly. Though, the old man didn't know the name for that anomaly, so stalkers decided to name it «Stagger», in the memory of the stalker. Yeah...

Did you ever happen to visit the Darkscape? Remember the tunnels there? Two car tunnels and one railroad. I heard that the military blew them up to stop mutants from getting out of the Zone. I think, they did it right - imagine meeting a chimera somewhere in Kiev...

Do you remember the railroad tunnel in the Darkscape? I heard that a group of cultists lived there before. They would kill anyone who would get too close. The tunnel is collapsed now, so you can't know for sure, if it's true or not.

You probably saw the railroad bridge in the Darkscape? I heard that it was completely fine before, there also were one more train car on it. Then suddenly a weird light appeared and "ate" a piece of bridge, together with the train car. I wonder, where this piece of train is now?

Did you ever visit the Country Road? I heard that this road is an alternate way to go from Dead city to Army Warehouses. The road itself is now occupied by the military, so getting there isn't possible. Tho, before the military, it was occupied by bandits. The road itself is surrounded by tons of mutants, but I think that military has already shot them all.

Did you know that a three specially smart controllers lived at the Country Road that is now occupied by the military? They could control all mutants in area, sending them to attack the army block post. Military got tired of it, so they sent a group to deal with one of the controllers. It angered the other two so much that they sent all the mutants that were under their control to attack block post at once. And oh boy, it was such a massacre, probably the biggest in the Zone history. But it seems that military managed to defend themselves. I mean, they're still occupying that road, right?

Once I heard, that there's a road leading from Army Warehouses to the Radar that avoids all monolithians' block posts. Though, this road is filled with anomalies now - even the Guide doesn't take anyone through it anymore. Such a shame. Maybe there's something interesting left in there...

I heard that before Bar wasn't located on the factory's territory. At first, it was located to the south of the factory, in a small village in a basement of the store. It there before Duty cleared factory's territory from the mutants. Also, Bar wasn't named «100 Rads» then, instead it was named just «Stalker». Duty also had a base nearby, in another basement. And they didn't let anyone in. The village itself was full of houses, where blind dogs lived - Duty took care of them later. It would be interesting to visit that place sometime, look at some «landmarks»...

I heard that there are underground passages right under «Rostok» factory. Though, they weren't finished, so it's full of dead ends. That underground also had a lot of bloodsuckers in it. They slept there during day and left it for hunt at the night. Good thing is, Duty were able to clear out their nest. It would be very bad if they would still be in there.

Do you remember the railroad tunnel in the Garbage? I heard that it wasn't blocked before, and if you go deeper you can find underground hall. Bandits had some kind of temporary base there. They say this tunnel could lead you up to Hospital. Though, after one big emission, the tunnel became blocked - you can't go deeper anymore. I wonder if the bandits that were inside got out.

When Barmen received the documents from Agroprom undergrounds, the location of another laboratory became known - X9. The lab is hidden somewhere on the territory of Red Forest, but the exact location isn't mentioned, and so far no one could find an entrance. I was able to take a peek at the documents, and from the look of things, the scientists were experimenting on building up brain mass. It would be interesting to explore that lab, but places like that are very dangerous. It's probably filled with most vicious mutants.

I heard that there's a X9 laboratory hidden somewhere on the territory of Red Forest. Someone even found a body of a stalker, that had notes about that lab on his PDA - from the look of things, he was inside it. In his notes he stated that there was an unusual mutant living inside the lab - something like a brain mass. It created an illusion that lab was completely fine, like it was cleaned every day by someone. This mutant could also control people. Stalker noted that this "mass" contacted him and asked to build some kind of cart so that this mass could get outside. It seems like stalker ran out of the lab, but mutant was able to get into his brain - when they found stalker's body, he was laying with a hole in his head and a pistol in hand. The sad thing is, stalker didn't note the coordinates of the lab entrance. Though, maybe it's for the better.

Did you know that Freedom had a base in Dead City before mercs settled in? They were sitting tight, snipers on every roof. Some people say that they were shooting anyone who would get too close. I don't know exactly, why did they move out from there - maybe mercs made them, maybe spot in Army warehouses looked more promising for them. Anyway - you better not go there right now. Mercs that are sitting there now don't like any guests.

Do you know about bride across the Pripyat river? I heard that this bridge leads from Garbage right into Agroprom. Bandits were controlling it before, they took money for passage. But now it's impossible to go there - the place is full of chemical anomalies. Such a shame. Bandits probably left a lot of stuff there. Maybe we'll try visiting it someday? Who knows, maybe we'll find a safe way across.

You know about Fang, member of Strelok's group, right? I heard that he got killed by some merc somewhere at the Army Warehouses. Someone described this mercenary as person with bright eyes and scar on his face. Many people that hear this description instantly think about Scar, the merc that worked for Clear Sky. But I heard about another merc that fits the description. His name is Pin, he perfectly fits the description, tho I don't know where he is and who he works for. So maybe it wasn't Scar who killed Fang after all.

One stalker told me an interesting story. He said he was walking through Red Forest searching for artefacts, when he saw a strange semi-transparent orb floating above the ground. He wasn't very clever so he tried to touch it - suddenly everything became so bright. When light went off, he found himself on some kind of small island, surrounded by wood fence. It was so foggy, he couldn't see furhter than 20 meters away. Well, he found a trail and followed it, walked across the river by wooden bridge and saw an old church. He entered it and found some stuff laying around, like if someoen lived there: backpack and old rifle laying together, many maps on the wall, bed and some other things. He looked around and continued on walking. Behind the church there was a coast with small wooden boat. On his right - small wooden fence. He jumped across the fence - everything became bright again, he just managed to close his eyes in time. When he opened his eyes - he found himself somewhere in the Garbage. Mystery...

Do you know about a stalker called the Cartographer? I heard that he knows the Zone like the back of his hand, he was travelling with Guide before. It's hard to find him, and even harder to find his hideout. Some people say that he found a Space anomaly and set up his hideout inside of it. And it's very hard to find this particular anomaly - the Cartographer made a special device that allows you to track it. Yep, Zone is sure full of wonders.

I heard that there's a secret underground passage somewhere in the Garbage. And this passage doesn't lead out of it - it just leads from one side of junk pile to another. And some say that a stalker set up his hideout inside it. Tho if it would be someone's hideout, how would others know about it?

Have you ever heard of a stalker called the Dark Digger? I heard that he was the best digger in the Zone. He had a secret hideout in one of the junk piles at the Garbage. And it was hid in a way so you can't find it unless you know where to look. Sadly, he's dead now.

I heard that there's a road that leaves from the Radar right to CNPP. This road goes around Pripyat. Tho, going there is the same as committing suicide. The radiation there is so high - not a single suit will save you. And, it's full of most dangerous anomalies. On top of that, it has a huge psy-field across whole road that will zombify you.

Did you know that military had a dog at their block post in Cordon? And not just a dog, but a tamed blind dog. I don't know how did they manage to tame him, but the dog guarded the road that leads to block post. They called him Bobik. When a mutant or stranger came too close, Bobik would bark, alerting the soldiers. But one day soldiers found him dead. Maybe a mutant killed it, maybe some drunk stalker. Shame...

Did you know that zombies aren't always wandering around? Sometimes they just lay on the ground, like a dead bodies. They will keep laying like that until you disturb them. So be careful when looting corpses. Who knows...

You probably heard already that some stalkers say izloms will help you for food? Well, they actually won't help you now, but I heard that they did help in the past. I heard that there was one izlom that could even talk. That izlom lived at the Radar, but after some time mercs opened hunting season on him. That izlom told someone that he was a CNPP worker before the disaster. But now izloms are the same as zombies - just animals. It seems that their intellect decreased after more mutations.

Once, the ecologists gave a task for group of six stalkers to catch three karlicks that were stealing stuff from the bunker. Stalkers were thinking of killing the mutants, but eggheads insisted on getting them alive, for studying purposes. Stalker group approached karlick's lair, it was some kind of old farm. Stalkers went inside to look around. That place, indeed, contained many stolen things, but all of them were untouched, not a single box was opened and not a single package was torn. Suddenly they heard a laugh behind them. Stalkers turn around and see three karlicks standing in doorway and laughing. And as sudden as they appeared, they ran each in different direction. Stalkers ran after them, splitting up with two men for each karlick. They used walkie-talkies to coordinate their movement, so that they can chase all three karlicks into a single spot. And it felt like karlicks did the same thing - they saw through every trick and traps that stalkers were trying to pull off. Stalkers got tired of this shit, one of them sped up and caught the karlick. Suddenly, karlick puts his hands on stalker's head, making him scream at the top of his lungs. Everyone got scared and opened fire at the mutants. As a result, ecologists received three dead karlicks. They did save that one stalker, he said that the mutant tried to get into his head. Eggheads, of course, got disappointed in that result, but they still paid. Half. Ever since some people think that karlicks have a collective mind.

Did you know that karlicks can feel living things at the distance of 5-10 meters? It's impossible to sneak up to one of them without a special helmet - he'll feel you and run away. And if you get unlucky - even attack.

I heard that karlicks had a next in X-18 before. They lived at the top floors, while some kind of special mutant lived at the bottom floor, ruling them. They were afraid of going down, this mutant was like a god for them. Tho it seems that they got kicked out of there. That's a good thing.

Did you know that karlicks can build some things? I heard that they once made an interesting thing - gravitational shotgun. I don't know how did they manage to create this stuff, but this gun was shooting some rubbish with such a power, it could pierce through a vest. Only few of these shotguns were ever found, and I'm sure they were sold to the big land. But maybe scientists stored one of these guns away.

I heard one very creepy story... There was a big bloodsucker living somewhere at the «Rostok» factory before. It could kill a group of stalkers all alone, and eat them all alone too. Tho some say that he always lef tone alive as a bait, gnawing through his tendons so that he could not move. I dunno how Duty managed to deal with him. I heard that they hired an experienced stalker for this job. Damn, I would want to be as skilled as him.

I heard that there was a strange telepath rat in Dark Valley before. It could create some kind of illusions for people that would get too close. Tho I don't know if it's actually true or not. How can a rat have abilities like that?

Did you know that rats have their "queen"? It's a huge rat that gives birth to offsprings. This rat is guarded by rat wolves. I think that it's true that rat like that exists. I mean, did you see how many rats are around?
Have you ever saw a rat wolf? It's like a big and very aggressive rat. I heard that they're pack leaders. And if a rat wolf gets hungry while there's no food nearby - it would eat other rats. Yeah...

One stalker told me such stupid story. He told me that there once was a leader of blind dogs, a blind dog that could speak. They were fighting for territory with karlicks then, and this dog asked stalkers for help. I dunno how high you should be to even come up with such story...

Have you ever heard about pseudohumans? I heard that there was one sentient among them. He lived in Red Forest, and he actually was the one to tell stalkers the story of his "people". Tho I dunno how did he get there - didn't they lived in Pripyat undergrounds? Maybe they weren't even real - stalkers love to come up with such stories to scare the rookies. How do you think?

One veteran stalker told me such story. He once caught a SOS signal on his PDA. When he arrived at the spot, he only found five bodies and one barely alive stalker. He carefully approached the wounded, when stalker says: "Everyone is dead... Help me, please. I won't be able to stand up by myself". Well, veteran approached him, raised him on his shoulder and left the place. He walks back to camp when wounded says: "Look, a house... let's rest there for a bit". Stalker didn't like the idea, but he was tired, so he walked towards the house. He only made a few steps inside, when the door suddenly closed. Stalker immediatly threw the wounded on the bed, pulled out his gun and turned around. A weird mutant, straight from the nightmares, jumped towards him. It looked like a naked humanoid monster with ugly face and some kind of bat wings. Mutant raised it's arm, stalker aimed his gun - when suddenly a wounded guy pulls him by his leg. Stalker fell down, but still pressed the trigger. He got lucky and hit it dead. Stalker turned to the wounded - he was completely dead. Later, stalker found out that this mutant is called mimicry. It can read dead person's memory and control it's body, like a marionette, to lure it's prey into a trap.

I heard that there were strange mutants in Pripyat Undergrounds before - they were called morloks. They were people before, and when the disaster occured they were underground, where they mutated. They looked a bit like humans, tho they were very ugly. Their skin was blue, they had a big tumour on their head that covered half of their face, the other half didn't look pretty either. One of their arms was usually hypertrophied. And what's interesting: they had some kind of intelligence. They made clothes for themselves and used guns. They could even use grenades. In general - very dangerous mutant. Tho I heard that monolithians killed all of them while they were taking over the underground.

I heard that there's a very creepy mutant, called the mummy. The mutant itself isn't big and doesn't attack stalkers. But it parasitizes on corpses, using them as part of it's body. It would find two human bodies and merge with them, becoming one big mutant that could even hunt stalkers. I heard that these mutants live somewhere in Pripyat Undergrounds... Let's not go there, shall we?

Dutyers told me that Dead City was full of zombies before. And not just zombies, but some weird ones, with parasites that took over their heads. Those parasytes spread their spores in the air, and if those spores get inside a human or a dog, they would multiply inside the body until they grow up so big that they can eat the brain. After that they "hatch" through the head, releasing tentacles in the body. That way they can control their preys. And Dead City was really infested with those parasites. Good thing that Duty was able to stop them from spreading. It would be a real apocalypse if they didn't. I think Freedom noticed that city was cleared and moved in then.

I heard that some kind of parasites were living in Yantar before. The parasite would get into your body by spores and it'd completely replace your head in several days. Eggheads made a special device for safe sample collecting process. And the most interesting thing is - those parasites weren't living there for fun. They were guarding a facility that was hidden underground.

One story I've heard... In one of the laboratories they were experimenting on humans. Scientists there tried to create super soldiers. But they couldn't complete their research - something happened in the lab and all staff died. And the survived "super soldiers" grouped together and set up their lair in that particular lab. They also had a pseudogiant trapped on the lowest floor - they were scared of him so much, they caught stalkers, stunned them and threw them to him. The "soldiers" themselves weren't intelligent, they were more like a zombies, but I heard that some of them could talk. Stalkers named them pseudohumans. Yep. They all are dead now, probably. That's good, I think.

Stalkers that visited labs told me such story. There were piles of bodies laying in one room. And not a single body had a head. But they weren't just severed - they were very carefully amputated. And mechanical details were inserted in their bodies. Stalkers also found a document that mentioned a project called «Collector». The details that were inserted in those bodies allowed someone to control them remotely. Some sort of biological robots. Creepy stuff. Good thing that project wasn't successful. I wouldn't like ending up as one of their toys...

I heard that there was a strange mutant living in the lake near Dead City, stalkers called it «Sentient lake». It looked like a very ugly giant crab. This mutant sat in that lake and controlled all the mutants around. And not just mutants - it could even control stalkers, if they would get too close. It created a lot of problems for the ecologists. They got tired of it and created some sort of device that would imitate the work of zombie's brain. They hired freedomers to grab this device and go to the lake. Freedomers mined whole place, retreated and blew it up. For next few days, the eggheads were wandering around, collecting pieces of the mutant.

A stalkers told me that karlicks have their own "freaks" - brown karlicks. They look really creepy, like they were created from several bodies, their skin has the colour of mud. They're bigger than the usual karlicks, but more stupid. They also had no abilities, and the only place you can meet them is underground.

I heard that there was another psy-emitter at the Yantar before, tho this one was biological. It controlled all mutants in the area, gathering them around itself. The emitter was placed underground, and getting to it without psy-helmet wasn't possible. Well, eggheads made a prototype and sent a group of stalkers there. Only one of them returned, but the psy-emitter was turned off.

One veteran stalker told me one story. He and his friends were hired by ecologists to turn off one bio psy-emitter. They were given psy-helmets sent to poisonous swamp. As they were shooting off the mutants, they found an underground passage there. They went inside. As they walk through dark corridor, they suddenly feel a very strong ringing in their ears. Stalker opens his eyes and sees only darkness. He heard a muffled voice mumble something in th distance. He had no other choice but to follow the voice. As he walks towards the voice, it grows louder and more audible. The voice was saying fragments of phrases. Stalker turned around the corner and saw light. As he entered it, he found himself on a street. He looked closer and realised that it was Lenin's square. The he saw few stalkers staying underneath the monument, their backs turned at him. Suddenly, they all turned around, and as the voice grew more evil, they raised their guns. Stalker had no choice but to shoot. As he got closer to their bodies, he realised that those were his companions. Looks like this emitter zombified them somehow. Stalker grieved for a moment, gathered his strength and continued on. He entered a building and walked through a very long corridor with many closed doors. One of the doors was open, stalker entered it. As he entered the room, he saw a strange scary mutant inside the big incubator, surrounded by phantoms. Stalker's vision started getting darker by a moment, but he didn't fall - he grabbed his grenade and threw it tat the monster. Good thing that he was able to hind behind the table. Grenade went off and stalker felt his head getting lighter as the "emitter" died. He took a look around, wandered across the underground, grabbed some stuff and returned to the ecologists. They paid him well, but he didn't do any business with them after that. I can understand him...

I heard a story that there was a karlicks nest in laboratory in the Dark Valley before. They slept there at night and would come out during day. They also had some kind of "master" - very powerful burer that could raise in the air even a train car. Karkils were afraid of him so much, they didn't even went down to him - they just left food at the entrance of his floor and did everything he asked. I heard that someone has cleared that lab out, so no more karlicks there I guess.

A friend of mine once told me that when he was searching for artefacts one night, he heard a baby's cry coming out of old wagon. Can you imagine? Children in the Zone! My friend is a good guy, so he immediately ran inside the wagon. As he entered it, he noticed a black bag in the corner. Suddenly, that "bag" turns around - it was burer! Good thing, my friend reacted in time and shot before burer could do anything. Who could imagine that these monsters could replicate sounds... And how the hell does burer know how child's cry sounds? Damn...

I heard a story that there was a talking flesh in Red Forest before. That flesh traveled across the Zone and decided to stay in that forest. It gave different tasks to stalkers. Sounds like a drunken nonsense to me. The only talking flesh I know is Sidorovich. He's such a pig...

I heard that there is a controllers' nest somewhere in the Pripyat. The oldest of them, «Conscience master», lives there. I don't know what exactly he can do, but all controllers revere him. Anyway, I don't think I want to meet him...

One stalker told me such story. He once decided to look around an old factory to see if there's something interesting left. He entered the building, wandered around for some time. Suddenly, he felt that something was off. He turns around and sees that all tools came to life and begun to crawl towards him. And not just tools - all the machines too! He started blasting in every direction as he ran away. He never visited that factory again. To be honest, I don't believe his story. I know that he never leaves the vodka alone. I bet he drank one-two bottles before heading out. He got lucky that there weren't any real mutants waiting for him. So here's my advice, mate: don't drink too much.

I heard that there's a very dangerous pseudodog somewhere in the Zone. It's all black, like the night. Stalkers say that it is a incarnation of death. If she comes for you - you have no chances of staying alive.

I once went on a raid with a group of experienced stalkers. We stayed at night in an old house. A storm started during the night, and suddenly I heard a strange sounds, either a moaning or muffled screams. I look outside the window and see something sparkling in the distance. I used my binoculars to see what was it. And there, on the roof of some building, were several poltergeists, making noises. And when the lightning would strike at them from time to time, they would moan louder. One of the veterans told me that it's their way of eating. Interesting, isn't it?

Have you ever heard about the «Brain link»? It's a machine in an underground laboratory somewhere in the Pripyat. It had many rooms, and one room had four pods with corpses inside. There were wires leading from every pod to a computer that was nearby. Stalkers that found the lab somehow managed to turn it on. As they turned it on, the words flashed on the screen: "Consciousness can't be found. Please, plug in working objects". I don't know what scientists there tried to achieve, but I think it's a good thing that they weren't successful. Who knows, maybe they were building another «Brainscorcher».

The hunters told me one story. They were hired to kill a bloodsucker that was bothering the stalkers. They made their preparations and eventually found mutant's lair. They check their surroundings and come inside during the day, while the mutants is asleep. The lair was an old house. They entered it and saw a bloodsucker sleeping while standing, like they always do, but he was also pressing something to his chest. Stalkers didn't want to give mutant any chance, so they just shot him dead. Then they came closer to see what he was holding. It was a child's painting. They looked around and saw many other paintings like that. And all paintings contain a family. Ever since then, stalkers believe that humanoid mutants have some memory about their past life still left in them. That's kinda sad, to be honest. Maybe the burers, controllers, bloodsuckers and others that we're killing like a beasts, once were a good people... Zone is such a bitch...

One hunter told me a story. He was hired to kill a bloodsucker. Well, he found it's trail and started following it, but bloodsucker felt him and made a detour. He walked around the hunter and attacked him from behind, but stalker was fast enough to shoot. Though he didn't kill the mutant and it ran off. Hunter ran after him, but tripped and dislocated his shoulder. He couldn't fight like this, so he returned to the camp. After a few days as his shoulder got fixed, he went on a hunt once again. This time he paid attention to every sound, his rifle ready. He followed the same trail, and suddenly he heard a noise behind him. Stalker turns around, raises his gun, but realised it was just a stone falling down. But why did the stone just fall? Hunter realised that something was off. He turns back and sees a bloodsucker flying towards him. Stalker jumps to the side, mutant flies past him. He shot and this time he got it good. He took his trophy and return to camp, where he told everyone what happened. Everyone got surprised - are mutants capable of such tricks? Ever since, hunters prefer to complete their hunt in one go. These mutants won't make the same mistake twice.

I heard one creepy story. When Freedom was still sitting in Dead City, they sent a group to explore the old school building. Well, the group wend in and took a look around. They finished exploring and decided to go back, when suddenly they heard small footsteps. They got alarmed, thought it was a karlick. Suddenly, from one of the classrooms, a weird, dunno how to call it, child's figure comes out. It looked like a child's shadow, and it just stood there. Stalkers couldn't move a muscle. This shadow looked like a small girl in a school uniform. This "girl" grabbed a toy from the floor and suddenly threw it at the stalkers. They got scared and ran outside. They never returned to that place again. Though, I think it all was just their imagination. What "shadows"? That school is a big psy-zone, no wonder that they saw things. And about the flying toy - it was probably a poltergeist or a burer. They love throwing stuff.

I heard that bandits had a "shooting range". They captured crows and used them as targets. You would pay, they would release the crows and let you shoot them. For each shot crow they would pay you, and they only gave a limited time to shoot. But the thing is, you would use your own gun, and your own ammo. It just wasn't worth it at all - you would waste more money on ammo than you'd get. Only a few stalkers could make profit from it. Many couldn't even return the money they paid in the start. It was basically a scam.

I heard that there is an unusual type of pseudodogs - «Chernobyl dogs». It's something in-between of normal pseudodog and a psy-dog. If a human would look into that dog's eyes, he'd be blinded for a moment. And it's howl would disorientate anyone around. Dangerous beasts.
Whenever you visit Swamps, listen to the sounds around you. Boars love to hide in the bushes. If you get too close - they'll jump out and run over you.

Did you know that the biggest snorks lair was in the Agroprom? I heard that dutyers hired a skilled mercenary to get down there and flood the largest part of it. I don't know how did he manage to complete the job, but he did it. That part of the undergrounds got pumped out recently, so it's open for exploration. But I won't recommend going down there. I heard that some mutants are living there again.

I heard that snorks were smarter before. They could use sticks to fight, and even use their old guns. No, they didn't shoot, they just used them as clubs. I'm not sure if it's good or bad that they're more stupid now...

Did you know that there are different types of bloodsuckers? For example, there's underground bloodsuckers that are a bit smaller and have darker skin. There's also swamp bloodsuckers, also known as swamp things - their skin is more greenish and thicker. On top of that, they can jump very far. I saw it myself as one of these mutants jumped out of the bushes, grabbed a stalker and then jumped away with him. Scary...

Have you ever heard about the «Night King»? It was a very dangerous bloodsucker that lived somewhere deep in the Zone. Hunters that killed it told me that it would ignore any bullets - like it was invulnerable. It killed half of their group before one of the hunters shot it with under-barrel grenade launcher. Only then the bloodsucker got blown to pieces. And what's interesting - they found a «Night star» artefact inside him. Maybe he swallowed it, maybe it was somehow implanted inside him, but it seems that the artefact was the reason why the bloodsucker didn't care about the bullets.

I heard a story that after military cleared out X-18, they sent a small squad to check the surroundings. It was peaceful at first, before soldiers approached a small storehouse that was behind the main building. They entered it and froze - there were around 18 bloodsuckers! And all of them were just standing there, sleeping... Soldiers almost shot at them, but they hold their fire. They acted smart: mined the storehouse and put a machine gun at the distance. When everything was ready - they blew up the explosives and opened fire to kill anyone who survived the explosion. They killed every last of these sucking mutants without any casualties. So, be careful when exploring buildings - who knows, maybe you've stumbled upon bloodsucker's sleepover.

One stalker in the camp told me a story. He was walking around Zaton, exploring the terrain. Then he saw a cave. He approached it carefully - who knows, maybe it's mutant lair. Suddenly, he heard a voice saying: "Leave here, man...". And the voice was right inside his head. Stalker left the place immediately. Some time later he found out from the Trapper that there was a controller living in that cave, but another stalker already took care of him. Creepy stuff...

One old stalker told me that poltergeists didn't explode on death before. Instead, they would materialize, showing their physical body.
